roleset.name: aim at, design for
roleset.note: GEAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gear' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from gear.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gear towards
example.text: [Most revisions it will propose]-1 will be geared *trace*-1 toward slowing down program trading during stressful periods, said officials working with the exchange.
example.arg: toward slowing down program trading during stressful periods

example.name: gear to
example.text: He's totally geared to a punitive position.''

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: A number of artists have thus found it helpful to pool their talents , setting up workshops geared chiefly to the production of public art .
example.arg: to the production of public art

roleset.name: prepare
roleset.note: GEAR_UP-V NOTES: Arg1 defaults to some reflexive pronoun and is usually dropped--but itcan occur! (from gear.02-v)

example.name: arg2 as PP
example.text: HEALTH CLUBS gear up for a graying clientele.

example.name: arg2 as predicate
example.text: But because of the uncertainty of the outcome of the suit, [Mr. Conner's team]-1 has done little *trace*-1 to begin *trace*-1 gearing up to defend its title.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: PaineWebber-1 also was able *trace*-1 to gear up quickly thanks to the 1987 crash.
